title: Far Cry 4 Season Pass
description: Traveling to Kyrat a country hidden in the Himalays, you find yourself caught up in a civil war to overthrow the twisted dictator Pagan Min.
longDescription:
# EXCLUSIVE DAY MISSION
A top secret item is in danger of falling into enemy hands! Stop Pagan Min's forces from recovering the item first and using it against the rebels.

# VALLEY OF THE YETIS CAMPAIGN
Your helicopter has crashed on an unforgiving Himalayan ridge. Explore the frozen landscape and find tools to upgrade your camp. Protect it from a dangerous cult and be careful, the yetis await their prey.

# ESCAPE FROM DURGESH PRISON
You and a fellow captive have been rounded up and tortured in Yuma’s prison. Escape from the prison and survive the hostile lands of Pagan Min’s Kyrat.

# ADDITIONAL MULTIPLAYER MODE - PVP
Team up as Rakshasa or Golden Path and control a series of neutral locations across Kyrat’s countryside to protect them from being overrun by your opponents.

# MORE MISSIONS AND WEAPONS
Get 5 additional single player missions including Yak Farm, Blood Ruby, and Hurk’s Redemption, plus 5 more weapons.
